column2: He should have put something in it to make it at any rate decent before we came in.
column3: He should have put something in it to make it at any rate decent before we came in.

column2: I will, mamma.	I will, mamma.
And Bragton is here.	And Bragton is here.
My dear, my opinion is that we've made a mistake.	My dear, my opinion is that we've made a mistake.
I think I am.	I think I am.
